Interface NamedFunction<T,R>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the input of the function
R - the type of the output of the function
All Superinterfaces:
Function<T,R>
All Known Subinterfaces:
FormattedNamedFunction<T,R>
public interface NamedFunction<T,R> extends Function<T,R>
A function with a name. This function works like Function, but provides a name in the form of a String.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    IDENTITY_NAME
    The name for the identity NamedFunction.
    static final String
    NAME_JOINER
    The string used as joiner when doing the composition of two NamedFunction objects.
    static final String
    UNNAMED_NAME
    The default name to use when a name is not provided.

    andThen(Function<? super R,? extends V> after)
    Returns a composed named function that first applies this named function to its input, and then applies the after function to the result.

    Returns a composed named function that first applies the before function to its input, and then applies this named function to the result.

  • Method Details

    • name

      String name()
      Returns the name of this named function.
      Returns:
      the name of this named function

    • composeNames

      static String composeNames(String... names)
      Returns a string which is the concatenation of an array of strings taken as names. Takes the strings in names which are not the name of the unnamed or the identity functions and joins them with NAME_JOINER.
      Parameters:
      names - the strings to join
      Returns:
      the concatenation of the input names

    • from

      static <T, R> NamedFunction<T,R> from(Function<T,R> f, String name)
      Builds a named function given a function and a name.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the input of the function
      R - the type of the output of the function
      Parameters:
      f - the function
      name - the name
      Returns:
      the named function

    • from

      static <T, R> NamedFunction<T,R> from(Function<T,R> f)
      Builds a named function given a function, possibly with a default unnamed name. If the input function f is a NamedFunction, simply returns f; otherwise, calls from(Function, String) with the UNNAMED_NAME as name.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the input of the function
      R - the type of the output of the function
      Parameters:
      f - the function
      Returns:
      the named function

    • name

      static String name(Function<?,?> f)
      Returns the name of a function. If the function is a NamedFunction, returns the result of name(); otherwise, returns UNNAMED_NAME.
      Parameters:
      f - the function
      Returns:
      the name of the function

    • compose

      default <V> NamedFunction<V,R> compose(Function<? super V,? extends T> before)
      Returns a composed named function that first applies the before function to its input, and then applies this named function to the result. If the before function is a named function, the name of the returned function is a composition of the two names, through composeNames(String...).
      Specified by:
      compose in interface Function<T,R>
      Type Parameters:
      V - the type of input of the before function, and of the composed function
      Parameters:
      before - the function to apply before this function is applied
      Returns:
      the composed named function

    • andThen

      default <V> NamedFunction<T,V> andThen(Function<? super R,? extends V> after)
      Returns a composed named function that first applies this named function to its input, and then applies the after function to the result. If the after function is a named function, the name of the returned function is a composition of the two names, through composeNames(String...).
      Specified by:
      andThen in interface Function<T,R>
      Type Parameters:
      V - the type of output of the after function, and of the composed function
      Parameters:
      after - the function to apply after this function is applied
      Returns:
      the composed named function

    • renamed

      default NamedFunction<T,R> renamed(String name)
      Returns a named function operating as this function but renamed with the provided name.
      Parameters:
      name - the new name
      Returns:
      the renamed named function
